<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1884]]''' - Philologist [[Elias Lönnrot]], who compiled the ''[[Kalevala]]'', dies.
* '''[[1918]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] attends a medical board examination. 9th Royal Defence Corps at Easington is disbanded and Tolkien is to be based at Thirtle Bridge again.
* '''[[1989]]''' - [[Heren Hyarmen]] is founded by [[Ronald Kyrmse]] in [[wikipedia:São Paulo
column3: Brazil]]. On [[9 January]] [[2003]], the name was changed to "Heren Hyarmeno", the correct [[Quenya]] genitive to mean "Order of the South".

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2013]]''' - ''[[La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published in Spain.
** [[Borondir]] is on his way in search of the [[Éothéod]].
** The Host of the West reaches the [[Morgul Vale]]. The Infantry joins Cavalry.

column3: Samwise]] escape the [[Orcs]] and begin their journey along the road to [[Barad-dûr]].<noinclude>[[Category:Dates
